azurerm_web_application_firewall_policy.description: Manages a Azure Web Application Firewall Policy instance.

name.description: Gets name of the resource that is unique within a policy. This name can be used to access the resource.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Resource location. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

custom_rules.description: One or more `custom_rule` blocks as defined below.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the Web Application Firewall Policy.

priority.description: Describes priority of the rule. Rules with a lower value will be evaluated before rules with a higher value

match_conditions.description: One or more `match_condition` block defined below.

match_variables.description: One or more `match_variable` block defined below.

negation_condition.description: Describes if this is negate condition or not

variable_name.description: The name of the Match Variable

selector.description: Describes field of the matchVariable collection

enabled.description: Describes if the policy is in enabled state or disabled state Defaults to `Enabled`.

mode.description: Describes if it is in detection mode  or prevention mode at the policy level Defaults to `Prevention`.

id.description: The ID of the Web Application Firewall Policy.

create.description: Used when creating the Web Application Firewall Policy.

update.description: Used when updating the Web Application Firewall Policy.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Web Application Firewall Policy.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Web Application Firewall Policy.
